review_title: Getting worse and worse every year
pros: The company offer a lot of trainings
cons: Almost everything. Poor salary, worst management I saw, inexistent work processes, no career opportunities. People remain at the same level, the same position, the same office, with almost the same salary for sometimes 10 years. I quit after 5. The only good thing is that they offer a wide range of internal and external trainings for employees
